title: 10 Podcasts for Older Adults That Promise to Entertain—and Enlighten
sub_head: From retirement wisdom to movies to revisiting the past, these podcasts speak to issues of particular interest to those of a certain age
body:
Podcasts have come of age for listeners of all ages.
Whether it’s classic entertainment, financial planning, health advice, or almost any other subject, podcasts have exploded in popularity as audio programming that is both easy to consume and rich in content. Some 80 million Americans regularly tune into, download or stream podcast episodes, according to Edison Research, and more than two million series are now available.
